## Entity.removeComponent() method

Removes a component instance from the entity.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
removeComponent(component: string, triggerRemovedEvent?: boolean): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  component | <code>string</code> | component instance to remove |
|  triggerRemovedEvent | <code>boolean</code> | should this action trigger an event? |

<b>Returns:</b>

`void`
